17.post_text: What makes our French Fries world famous? Well, to start, we use Russet Burbank variety potatoes! After careful preparation, the potatoes are cooked in 100% vegetable oil at exactly 168ºC for about three minutes. To finish off, a light sprinkling of salt is added to the freshly cooked fries!
